Name: Beaphar Salmon Oil 430ml
Description: eaphar Salmon Oil is a delicious natural supplement suitable for dogs and cats, derived from sustainable fisheries. It is naturally rich in omega 6 and omega 3 oils, which means it is a good source of essential fatty acids.

Name: Beaphar Vitamin B 50ml
Description:
A shortage of B vitamins can lead to fur problems, nervousness and lethargy.
This Vitamin B-Complex ensures a healthy coat, proper-functioning of the nervous system and a healthy metabolism.

Name: Nutri-Vet Wild Alaskan Salmon Oil for Dogs
Description: Nutri-Vet Wild Alaskan Salmon Oil for Dogs provides both omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids to help maximize skin and coat health, promote a strong immune system, and support joint function. Veterinarian formulated to provide the best fish oil for dogs.

Name: Beaphar Laveta Super Multi-Vit
Description: Multi-Vit with Carnitine contains vitamins that can be used for sensitive skin and help maintain a healthy skin and coat. Carnitine has been added because this is important for the dog’s energy and for the functioning of the heart. Size: 50ml How to use: Mix through food or drinking water Dosages in teaspoons per day: Small Dogs: 1 teaspoon Medium-sized Dogs: 2 teaspoon Large Dogs: 3 teaspoon Very Large Dogs: 4 teaspoon.
